affect ( "sec_crew_walker", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );

	task ( "sec_walk" )
	{
		set ( "SET_GOAL", "Guard" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "sec_crew_walker_a" );
		set ( "SET_NAVGOAL2", "sec_crew_walker_b" );
		set ( "SET_NAVGOAL2", "sec_crew_walker_c" );
	}

	dowait ( "sec_walk" );
}
